title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 712.6 - Rereview
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 712.6 - Rereview

State Regulations
A rereview of a publication which has been disapproved by a
FMRC will be conducted by the FMRC upon the request of an inmate no less than
18 months subsequent to the previous disapproval. Nothing contained herein
shall prevent review of such publications by the FMRC or COMR prior to 18
months after disapproval, where conditions warrant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
712.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
